haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Carsten Olbrich, Obltn Carsten Olbrich
Ltn Fabian Spener, Ltn Fabian Spener
Uffz Konrad Herxheimer, Uffz Konrad Herxheimer
Uffz Urs Kehlmann, Uffz Urs Kehlmann

 The mission was flown from Lagnicourt aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 01/01/1916 near City(f) Beugnatre.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 57 was brought down by Carsten Olbrich of FA 46b.
Florentin Dubois was killed in action.
Carsten Olbrich and Viktor Schiller were  flying a DFW C.V.

On 01/01/1916 near Adinfer.
A F.E.2b of No 16 Squadron RFC was brought down by Wilfried Oppert of FA 46b.
Lt Melvin Dixton was killed in action.
Lt Peyton Bladewell was killed in action.
Wilfried Oppert was  flying a DFW C.V.

On 01/01/1916 near City(f) Beugnatre.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 57 was brought down by Konrad Herxheimer of FA 46b.
Louis de La Cruz was killed in action.
Konrad Herxheimer and Patrik Schorner were  flying a DFW C.V.
narrative:
My first mission is quite eventful   We are accosted by Nieuports as we were in our climb pattern.  The Nieuports were set upon by Fokkers from Jasta 5.  Two attacked us and we bring both down.  I am credited with a victory.  

We continue on to bomb the terget.  Unfortunately our high altitude attack misses the mark and causes no damage.
